metadata.title: CVE-2021-38614 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Polipo through 1.1.1, when NDEBUG is used,allows a heap-based buffer overflow during parsing of a Range header. NOTE:This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported bythe maintainer.

criterions.comment: polipo package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
